results.doc_title: OTP and Multiple Product Families Support
results.summary: This document outlines two workstreams for adding Price Set support to New Ventures brands: Factor Form US (VMS) with OTP support and channel exclusion, and The Pets Table US with multiple product families support. Both projects target a December 5, 2025 launch date, with VMS requiring 2-3 weeks web and 4 weeks backend work, while TPT requires 2-3 weeks backend work after discovery completion.
key_points: Two separate workstreams: VMS (Factor Form) for OTP support with channel exclusion, and The Pets Table for multiple product families support
Both projects target December 5, 2025 launch date, with TPT also running an AA test first to validate setup
VMS frontend needs to send additional data to pricing API with separate calls for OTP vs subscriptions since API doesn't support both simultaneously
VMS backend requires creating Request Context Manager, new price set data schema for OTP, and support for OTP + Plans calls in parallel
TPT backend work is TBD after discovery (completed Nov 14, 2025), with medium effort estimated at 3-4 weeks
TAM engineers will be integrated into Pricing team during support period with clear implementation plans provided
One backend engineer (Morteza Pourkazemi) may be able to complete work for both initiatives
decisions: Frontend will do a POC for parallel calls if backend capacity is limited for OTP + Plans support
TPT will run AA test first on Dec 5, 2025 to validate setup before full launch
TAM engineers will be integrated into Pricing team with immediate implementation work after onboarding
action_items: VMS Frontend: Send additional data to pricing API with separate API calls for OTP vs subscriptions
VMS Backend: Create Request Context Manager and new price set data schema to support OTP
VMS Backend: Implement support for OTP + Plans call in parallel
TPT Frontend: Onboard TPT on PeX (most of FE work)
TPT Backend: Update TPT CRM side to support multiple product families on NV-CRM service
Morteza Pourkazemi to reach out to Vitor Buccianti and pricing team regarding TPT CRM updates
Handle TrialBox pricing for TPT (CRM communication) to enable price testing
